ApproxsimClient.evolver
Interface Evaluator

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultEvaluator, SimulationEvaluator
public interface Evaluator

An Evaluator provides performance measure for a ParameterInstanceSet. E. g. given a set of parameter instances {x, y, x, ...} the evaluator returns an evaluation of the fitness of that particalar set of parameter instances.

Method Summary
 void addEventListener(EvaluatorEventListener listener)
          Register a new EvaluatorListener on this evaluator.
 Evaluation evaluate(ParameterInstanceSet set)
          Returns a measure for the ParameterInstanceSet
 Evaluation getPreliminaryEvaluation()
          Returns the preliminary value of the evaluation if any, else null.
 boolean isFinished()
          Returns true if the evaluation has finished.
 void removeEventListener(EvaluatorEventListener listener)
          Removes a EvaluatorListener from this evaluator.

                    throws EvaluatorException
